_sText:
INTRODUCTION
 Finally I can release a functional, good looking map. I have been trying a lot on soccer stuff, normally just did quick jobs, that weren't worth releasing them. This map was created for the extreme Soccer League, the XSL. If you haven't played soccer yet, search for servers with ka_soccer as map filter, it can be a lot of fun. The original stadium is the "Nuevo Estadio Independiente" in Spain. EDIT: THIS IS THE FIX-VERSION, CHANGES INCLUDE PUBLIC SERVER-FUNCTIONALITY AND BUGFIXES!
INSTALLATION
 Just put the ka_soccer_xslcentre_fix.bsp into your CS:S map folder, which is located at: ?:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\*STEAM NAME*\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps\ or similar folder structures.
ABOUT THE MAP
 The goal of the map is to use teamplay to score and assist goals. If you are alone or with a friend on the map, you can check out the training area to improve your skills or just take a bath in the whirlpool.
LAST NOTES
 If you find any bug, feel free to contact us. If you like this map, please rate it good and add it to your favorites. Oh, and please upload it to your soccer servers! Thanks!
